chatbot.title: Krishi Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm your Krishi Assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.pricing: You can view current prices on our Marketplace page. Prices are set directly by farmers.
chatbot.delivery: We offer delivery tracking. Orders go through: Pending → Accepted → Out for Delivery → Delivered.
chatbot.payment: We support secure online payments. You can pay using UPI, cards, or net banking at checkout.
chatbot.sell: To sell your produce: Register as a farmer, go to your Dashboard, and click 'Add Product'.
chatbot.schemes: Check the Community section under 'Govt. Schemes' for the latest government agricultural programs.
chatbot.support: You can reach our support team at support@smartkrishi.com or call 1800-KRISHI.
chatbot.fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Please contact our support team for assistance.
